SIGNATURES Pursuant to the requirements of the
Securities Act of 1933, as amended, and the
Investment Company Act of 1940, as amended,
SPDR ®Series Trust, the Registrant, certifies
that it meets all of the requirements for
effectiveness of this Registration Statement
pursuant to Rule 485(b) under the Securities
Act of 1933, as amended, and has duly caused
this Amendment to the Registration Statement
to be signed on its behalf by the undersigned,
thereunder duly authorized, in the City of
Boston and the Commonwealth of Massachusetts
on the 6 thday of August, 2020.
                                              
       SPDR® SERIES TRUST                     
  By:                      /s/ Ellen M.       
                           Needham            
                           Ellen M. Needham   
                           President
